alert.note: Alert for El Paso (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 26 at 11:07PM MDT until July 27 at 7:01AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Colorado... Fountain Creek Near Fountain Creek near Fountain affecting El Paso County. For the Fountain Creek...including Colorado Springs, Fountain Creek near Fountain...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Fountain Creek Near Fountain Creek near Fountain. * WHEN...From this evening to tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Action Stage. Minor overbank flow spills into low lying agricultural areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 PM MDT Tuesday the stage was 10.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 11.3 feet just after midnight tonight. - Action stage is 11.0 feet. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning at 715 AM MDT.
